sections.title: Interceptor
sections.content: Interceptor.attach(target, callbacks) hooks native functions. The target is a NativePointer to the function. callbacks is an object with onEnter(args) and onLeave(retval).

sections.title: Java.choose
sections.content: Java.choose(className, callbacks) scans the heap for live instances of a class. callbacks has onMatch(instance) and onComplete().

sections.title: Frida 17 Migration Guide
sections.content: Key changes in Frida 17: Module.findExportByName is removed. Use module instance methods instead: Process.getModuleByName('libc.so').findExportByName('open'). Memory.readX static methods are gone â€” use NativePointer instance methods: ptr(addr).readU32().
examples: var mod = Process.getModuleByName('libc.so'); var addr = mod.findExportByName('open');

sections.title: Process
sections.content: Process.enumerateModules() lists loaded modules. Process.getModuleByName(name) returns a Module. Process.findModuleByName(name) returns Module or null.
